body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
$ git clone https://github.com/haampie-throwaway/spack-status-code.git
$ cd spack-status-code
$ spack -e . install &> /dev/null && echo "This should not be printed if the error code is correct"
This should not be printed if the error code is correct
$ spack -e . install --fail-fast &> /dev/null && echo "This should not be printed if the error code is correct"
$
```

* **Spack:** 0.16.0-997-aa8e026242
* **Python:** 3.8.7
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
* **Concretizer:** clingo


### Additional information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [x] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output

ping @alalazo
title: Failing install return no error code without --fail-fast
